subtree.speaker: Guardian
subtree.line: The next game I have for you is simple. The energy flowing through this real is getting blocked by these stones of thought.

subtree.speaker: Gaurdian
subtree.line: I need you to remove them. To do so, select a stone. This stone can leap over an adjacent stone as long there is an empty space for it to leap to

subtree.speaker: Guardian
subtree.line: Any stone that is leaped over is removed from the board. I will lete you pass when there are four stones or fewer left.
